Hydras:

"Scorponok"tiped Hydras via private channel keep an eye in Nightsh=
iftand he said in a open channel "Go to the throne room, we will meet there=

after that Hydras opened a channel to Cyclunos and said "Cyclonus, repor=
t!"

is thread. I almost missed it since it was in
the same post as Tuscon movin=
g into the Ark :)

> Night Shift keeps up with scorponok, as he kicks up du=
st beneath his tires while he rolls over uneven ground without much trouble=
.
>
> " I dunno where that Matrix is now. I'm sure Tucson's already figured=
 me out'n hid it somewhere else. It used ta be in Prime's chest, but I don'=
t think that's where it is anymore. I know that bot Scorponok, he's not stu=
pid. If he feels that somethn' ain't right, he'll go out of his way ta make=
 sure nothn' goes wrong. And I saw inside his chest, he doesn't have it in =
'em, that was a lie. If anything, he probably has it hidden somewhere in a =
different grid all together."
>

Scorponok grunted as he moved swiftly over=
 the terrain, his form
easily able to traverse the uneven surface. While de=
signed primarily
for sub surface travel, he appeared to be doing quite well=
 in the
terrain he was in.

"He moved it a couple of grids away?" Scorponok=
 sounded a bit
skeptical. "I thought the Matrix had to stay housed within O=
ptimus
Prime's form?"

Even as they spoke Hydras' fortress came into view. =
In the air above
them Scourge in his air ship mode floated out of the base =
and looked
around, seeming to almost immediately pick up on Scorponok and
N=
ightshift's approach.

"Scorponok and Nightshift have arrived." Scourge sai=
d over his radio
link to Hydras and Cyclonus.

(TAG)

Preston
